title: Aquae Rusellanae
description: A thermal site located near Roman Rusellae in regular use and reuse since at least Roman times. Its ancient name is not known. The first modern excavations and mapping efforts date to the 18th century of the modern era.

properties.description: Location verified in Google Earth after Chirico 2021, page 4 fig. 4.
